net.trajano.jetng.internal

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.jetng.internal.Util

  • public final class Util
extends Object
    This class contains methods that have been exported so it can be tested without making it part of the public API.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

    • Method Detail

      • escapeJavaString

        public static String escapeJavaString(String s)
        Escapes a string to make it work as a Java string. The result will already be quoted. The exception is if "s" is null this will return "null" as a string (without quotes). If the input string is empty this will return an empty string. If it is a single character, then the quoted string returned is single quoted.
        Parameters:
        s - string to escape
        Returns:
        quoted escaped string

      • escapeSingleCharacter

        private static String escapeSingleCharacter(char c)
        Escapes a single character.
        Parameters:
        c - character to escape
        Returns:
        escaped character

      • isTextComing

        public static boolean isTextComing(ParserContext context,
                   char firstChar,
                   String text,
                   PushbackReader r)
                            throws IOException
        If a defined text is coming up, this will return true and the reader will be at the point after the text. Otherwise, the data will be pushed back up until the character
        Parameters:
        context - parsing context
        firstChar - first character
        text - text being expected.
        r - reader
        Returns:
        end comment
        Throws:
        IOException
